SELECT sys_total_health_score.score, sys_total_health_score.time FROM sys_total_health_score INNER JOIN(SELECT max(sys_total_health_score.time) AS max_time FROM sys_total_health_score GROUP BY date_format(sys_total_health_score.time, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS son ON sys_total_health_score.time = son.max_time ORDER BY sys_total_health_score.thid DESC limit 7
